button styles: button { background-color: #4CAF50; color: white; padding: 10px 20px; border: none; border-radius: 4px; }
button { background-color: #2196F3; color: white; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 8px; }
flexbox layout: display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center;
display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; justify-content: center;
